story_22_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: The second round of the finals...
story_22_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hm? Are you having second thoughts, Paulo?
story_22_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I suppose I can’t blame you. That one’s a friend of
yours, right?
story_22_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
That’s right... [Name:PlayerNickname ] started
collecting badges around the same time that I did.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But...before I knew it, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’d" F="she’d" ] already gotten far
ahead of me.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] was ahead of me gathering badges, and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
was ahead of me battling Team Break...
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: But today is going to be different!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
The two of you taught me chivalry, kindness, and
most importantly, strength.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I was able to become who I’ve always wanted to
be, all thanks to forming a team with the two of
you, who I idolize.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
What I’ve always wanted to be... I’ve become a
steadfast Trainer who won’t lose out to anyone in
strength or spirit!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
This time, things will be different. I’ll use
everything I’ve learned and battle with all my
strength. There’s no way our team will lose!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
It seems we too must battle with all our might in
answer of this spirited declaration!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Boy was I surprised when I heard that our
second-round opponent was you, Paulo!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: Haha! I could say the same about you.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
But I’m glad we get to meet on the field of battle
in the PML like this!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Hm. Compared to before, you seem to be
overflowing with confidence.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2400_10:
It seems those teammates of yours also made for
some good teachers, eh?
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2500_10: Yes! They’re Trainers I hold in high regard!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Paulo’s teammates are Wikstrom and Wulfric? This
doesn’t look like it’ll be easy.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Y’know what to do. Let’s go, Korrina!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
We hail from the same region, so there’s no need
for pleasantries or holding back. Let us battle with
all of our might!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_2900_10: OK! I’m already getting fired up! Let’s go all out!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Thanks to this team, I reflected on myself and
realized what you are to me.
story_22_02000/2401_1001_3200_10:
You’re the rival that’s always ahead of me.
The rival I never want to lose to!
story_22_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: But that ends today! I’ve changed. Here, today...
story_22_02000/2401_0401_3600_10: I’m going to win. And I’ll continue to win...
story_22_02000/2401_0402_3800_10: You’re wrong! I’ll win, and I’ll keep winning...
story_22_02000/2401_1001_3900_10: I’ll show you a true champion team!
